import Popup from "./components/Popup"; import Badge from "./components/Badge"; function OrderDetail({data, onClose}){ const { monolithOrderId, orderDate, carName, carImage, addressPickup, addressDropOff, pickupDate, pickupTime, dropOffDate, dropOffTime, isWithDriver, duration, rentalArea, specialRequest, specialNote } = data; console.log('data: ', data); return(
Order ID #{monolithOrderId}

{carName}

{addressPickup}

{pickupDate}

{pickupTime}

{addressPickup}

{dropOffDate}

{dropOffTime}

Detail Pesanan

Tipe Sewa Mobil Durasi Area Sewa Permintaan Khusus Catatan
{isWithDriver ? 'Dengan Supir': 'Tanpa Supir'} {`${duration} Hari`} {rentalArea} {specialRequest} {specialNote}

Detail Pemesan

Tipe Sewa Mobil Durasi Area Sewa Permintaan Khusus Catatan
{isWithDriver ? 'Dengan Supir': 'Tanpa Supir'} {`${duration} Hari`} {rentalArea} {specialRequest} {specialNote}
) } export default OrderDetail;
